summary: A character that is designed to look and play like Arya Stark from the ASoIaF series. :)
descriptionHtml:
Breton * Level 1 * Riverwood

[b][u]Required mods:[/u][/b]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168//?]Apachii Sky Hair[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2812/?]Better Females by Bella[/url] (Less Make Up)
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2637//?]Younger Bretons[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13722//?]The Eyes of Beauty[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25404//?]Random Alternate Start[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14751/?]Game of Thrones Mini-Pack[/url]

[b][u]Suggested mods:[/u][/b]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/30936//?]RealVision ENB[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/3863//?]Sky UI[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13486//?]Winter Is Coming - Cloaks[/url]

[b][u]Roleplaying suggestions:[/u][/b]
Standing Stone = The Thief
Magic/Health/Stamina ratio = 2/1/2
Primary Skills = Illusion, One-handed, Pickpocket, Sneak
Secondary Skills = Archery, Smithing, Light Armor, Lockpicking
Werewolf/Vampire = Werewolf
Spouse (for Gendry/Arya shippers) = Halbarn Iron-Fur (Dragonborn)
Followers = Bran the Husky (Dawnguard)
Ganeplay = Use stealth whenever necessary, resorting to Needle in close quarters combat. Be curious and adventurous, always willing to take risks. Hunt for food. Purchase a small house later on, nothing too grand. Work for profit, not for charity. Persuade whenever given the option to do so.
Factions = Thieves Guild, Dark Brotherhood, Companions (only until Circle member), Mage\'s Guild (only to train in Illusion/buy spells)

[url=http://thekentuckyblog.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/07/Season-2-Arya-Stark.jpg]Reference picture[/url]
author: Tayloroids
